name: Rhyperior
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrier
ancient_trait.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rock Wall
abilities.effect: Any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.
